bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of one’s teeth gradually growing to the extent that eventually they push the mouth wide open and make it difficult to eat. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zhu 术 quoting Ji feng pu ji fang 雞峰普濟方 22: 牙齒逐日微長，漸漸脹開口，難為飲食，蓋髓溢所致 , “The teeth grow a bit longer day by day, gradually widening and opening the mouth and making it difficult to drink and eat. Now, this is brought forth by marrow spill ”, writes: 牙 齒日長，漸至難食，名髓溢病 , “The teeth grow longer day by day until eventually one finds it difficult to eat. This is called ‘ marrow spill ’ disease”. Sun chuang zhong feng 損瘡中風 , wind stroke via wounds and sores [1]

Pathological Condition identical with zhu chuang zhong feng 諸瘡中風 , wind stroke via all possible sores. Shi liao ben cao 食療本草 Substance Entry qin jiao 秦椒 , for external treatment of 損瘡中風 , “ wind stroke via wounds and sores ”.
